headline: Fewer Outages and Faster Restoration Coming to JCP&L Customers in Northern Monmouth County
summary: Northern Monmouth County residents can look forward to more reliable power as Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a FirstEnergy (NYSE: FE) company, invests $1.6 million to modernize the local electric system. The upgrades support fewer disruptions and shorter ones when they do occur for thousands of customers in Keyport, Hazlet and Union Beach.

headline: JCP&L Investing $15 Million in Stronger Electric Future for Hunterdon County
summary: A reliability-focused $15.4 million upgrade is underway in Hunterdon County that will make electric service more resilient for more than 3,600 customers of Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) company.
